summary: This is an email chain from November 2019 forwarding a report about an alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The original message describes a 17-year-old girl, Ms. [redacted], who was allegedly abused by Epstein at his New York townhome and his Caribbean island home. The email is being forwarded to the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The alleged perpetrator who abused the victim at his properties in New York and the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: A 17-year-old girl who was allegedly abused by Jeffrey Epstein on multiple occasions at his properties.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: The guardian of the alleged victim, residing in Calderitas, Mexico.

connections.description: Epstein is alleged to have abused the victim on numerous occasions at his properties.
One Ms. is described as the guardian of the other Ms., the alleged victim.

events.title: Alleged Abuse of Victim
events.description: The victim, Ms., was allegedly abused by Jeffrey Epstein on numerous occasions at his New York townhome and his Caribbean island home in the Virgin Islands.

events.title: Report Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An email is forwarded with instructions to send information about an alleged Epstein victim to the FBI.

keyFacts: A 17-year-old girl, Ms. [redacted], is identified as an alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
The alleged abuse occurred at Epstein's townhome in New York and his island home in the Virgin Islands.
The victim's guardian, based in Mexico, is seeking to register a claim against Epstein's estate.
The information was being forwarded to the FBI in November 2019.
The victim did not have legal representation at the time but was in negotiations to retain an attorney.
